text:
WTA n.1 Ash Barty won't play the US Open:
“My team and I have decided that we won’t be travelling to the US [...] there are still significant risks involved due to Covid-19 and I don’t feel comfortable putting my team and I in that position"
https://t.co/ObLIluQQCt
